Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six This popular property is located in Seminyak just minutes from the beach and close to public transport, local shops and restaurants. Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six has a stylish common area including the magnificent four-tiered, resort pool with its own man-made beach, and also features the tiki-style Coconut Bar and the swim-up Sunken Pool Bar. Couples, friends or families will all find plenty to enjoy here with the resort featuring both a great kids club and an excellent day spa, plus a departure lounge available after check out for guests with late night flights. Superior Interconnecting Room (7 Nights) Travel Dates: 1 Sep - 30 Sep 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $964 Family of 5 (2A/3C) per person fr $785 Travel Dates: 1 Jul - 31 Aug 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $1,020 Family of 5 (2A/3C) per person fr $827 Travel Dates: 9 Nov - 25 Dec 25 & 6 Jan - 30 Apr 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $866 Family of 5 (2A/3C) per person fr $701 Travel Dates: 1 May - 30 Jun 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $915 Family of 5 (2A/3C) per person fr $736 Note: ^Discount is already included in the advertised price and no further discount applies Strictly no Check in and no Check Out during Nyepi period on 19th March 2026 Includes 7 nights at Blue-Zea by Double-Six -Daily Buffet Breakfast including choices of 1x unlimited made-to-order & buffet breakfast at Double-Six Rooftop Sunset Bar (includes buggy drop and pickup service) Return private transfers from Denpasar airport to hotel Bonus ^ SAVE up to 35% PLUS - 1x Bucket of Beers to be shared - 1x 2 Course Set Menu Lunch at the Beach Restaurant 1x Set Menu dinner at Pallas Greek Taverna Restaurant at Blu-Zea Resort (Food Only) - Food and Beverage 20% off from total bill at The Beach Restaurant - Usage of Kids Corner for the first 3 hours with a dedicated team of staff. - A 15% Discount on all treatments at The Spa Per Person, from $701 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 30 Nov 2025. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 1 Oct 2025 to 31 Oct 2026 (unless otherwise specified).Family pricing is based on a per person cost for up to 2 adults and 3 children (2-11) sharing one room and using existing bedding. Extra night rates are per person. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For split stays please contact your travel consultant. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. Issue Date: 01 Oct 25.
